Backstory.Title: Space pirate
Backstory.BaseDesc: Piracy appears everywhere that governments are weak and society spread thin. NAME was part of this age-old part of human existence, extorting and smashing peaceful trade ships for profit.

Backstory.Title: Pit brawler
Backstory.BaseDesc: NAME was nine years old when HE got in HIS first fight. HECAP won, but more important was the enjoyment of HIS audience. Pit fighting turned out to be a lucrative career for those who could survive it. And it was even mostly legal.

Backstory.Title: Illegal shipwright
Backstory.BaseDesc: There is a law that say that you're not allowed to put terawatt-range grasers on a cargo scow. Especially if you hide them under what looks like a communications dish for better ambush potential. NAME discovered that there is great profit to be made, however, from those who are uninterested in these laws.

Backstory.Title: Courtesean
Backstory.BaseDesc: NAME was used for HIS body by hundreds of customers in brothels on several planets. HECAP gained some mental marks and a special kind of street smarts.

Backstory.Title: Space marine
Backstory.BaseDesc: NAME was a warrior in an Imperial navy. HISCAP job was to punch into enemy starships, gun down the crew, and capture the ship intact. And HE was good at it.

Backstory.Title: Assassin
Backstory.BaseDesc: NAME was a professional assassin. HECAP was cold, calculating, and made a good profit. In this business, an utter lack of empathy was an asset.
